sentence.Network_en: Maybe she went where she didn't need clothes: a nudist colony.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许她去了一个不要衣服的地方: 比如裸体俱乐部.

sentence.Network_en: My family and I are joining a nudist colony.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的家人和我加入了一个裸体主义群体.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1961年，BSBA年会一致认为，裸体主义者(nudist)这个字是不恰当的，应该加以抛弃，转而使用天然主义者(naturist)这个字。第一个 …
60年代初不胫而走的“天体片”（Nudist）亦归此类。在70年代前，欧美性爱网址。

list.abs: my fiancee and I first went to a nudist beach six years ago .六年前我与未婚妻第一次去了裸体海滩。
“裸体主义者殖民地”(nudist colony)已不再是一个受到人们喜爱的词汇，但这个词汇被天然主义者用来揶揄那些入会标准严苛的自有土 …
the astronomer usually arrive nudist colony to the profound mystery of research astronomy .天文学家常常到天体营去研究天文的奥秘。

forty miles had turned into 60.At one point I had even cycled through a nudist colony , then , coming to a dead end , had been forced to return shamefaced right back through it .四十英里的路变成了六十英里，我甚至经过了一个天体营，然后骑进了一个死胡同，只能厚着脸皮再经过天体营骑回来。
in a nudist camp people are in a state of nature .在天体营里大家都是裸体的。

entry.def: Nudism is the practice of not wearing any clothes on beaches and other areas specially set aside for this purpose.

example.ex: Nudism, the council decided, was doing the resort more harm than good.
example.tran: 委员会认定在休闲胜地的裸体行为弊大于利。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who practices nudity for reasons of health or religion
